divs: Sighting Details"Narrative below was submitted by MUFON Dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness." During the summer of 1988, either July or August, this single witness was driving her car heading east on Highway 25A. It was approximately 7- 7:30 pm but it was still light out. Stopped at a red light, she observed a HUGE oval-shaped craft over the four lane highway, skimming over the top of the trees, heading north. The craft had windows in which she could see someone inside. The craft was as big as a football field. She could hear a sound like a motor that went boom-boom-boom. She felt the craft was in trouble. She saw this for about 10 minutes. She said she called the police and the newspaper, but no one called her back.
trends: There has been one other sighting in East Norwich
There were no other sightings in East Norwich on or around July 31st 1988
Summary: Huge craft seen skimming trees with someone inside.
